title: Services
description: Manage your homelab services and organize them into groups
subtitle: {{count}} configured service

help.title: Service Management
help.overviewContent: This page allows you to configure and manage all your homelab services (Plex, Radarr, Sonarr, etc.). Each service represents an application accessible through the MCP API.
help.configureContent:
To add a service:
• Click "Add"
• Select the service type
• Enter the base URL and port
• Configure authentication (API key or credentials)
• Optionally, set the external URL for remote access
help.testContent:
Verify that your services are correctly configured:
• Individual "Test" button on each service
• "Test All" button to check all active services
• Tests verify DNS resolution, network connection, HTTP response, and authentication
help.statusContent:
Status indicators show the state of each service:
• Green (Online): service is accessible and functional
• Red (Error): connection or authentication problem
• Gray (Disabled): service manually disabled
• Yellow (Unknown): never tested
help.groupsContent:
Organize your services into custom groups:
• Create thematic groups (Media, Downloads...)
• Assign a color and priority
• Use groups to filter exposed MCP tools

form.baseUrlHelp: Internal URL to access the service

errors.portInvalid: Port must be a number between 1 and 65535
errors.apiKeyRequired: API key is required for this service type
errors.usernameRequired: Username is required for this service type
errors.passwordRequired: Password is required for this service type

testModal.title: Test Connection
testModal.serviceDisabled: Service is currently disabled. Enable it first to run tests.

result.successMessage: Service is reachable and responding correctly

empty.title: No services configured
empty.description: Start by adding your first service.

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this service?

serviceGroups.title: Service Groups
serviceGroups.description: Create custom groups to organize your services

help.title: Service Groups
help.overviewContent: Service groups allow you to organize your services into custom categories. They are used to filter MCP tools exposed to the AI.
help.createContent:
To create a group:
• Click "New"
• Give the group a descriptive name
• Add an optional description
• Choose a color to identify it
• Set a display priority
help.assignContent:
After creating a group:
• Select the group from the list
• Go to the "Services" tab
• Check the services to include
• Changes are saved automatically
help.mcpContent:
Service groups are used to:
• Filter tools exposed in Open WebUI
• Create specialized MCP endpoints per group
• Limit access to certain tools based on context

management.title: Select a group
management.description: Choose a service group from the list to view and manage its services.
